Html:
The description of the buff is ".3 bloodlust". does that mean that it gives you 30% attack speed for the entire duration of the fight, or that it gives you 45 seconds of bloodlust every 10 minutes.

say in a 5 minute fight you wouldn't have lust up the entire time would adding the buff be like having it the entire time?

The 0.3 refers to the haste it gives; in this case .3 = 30%. "Bloodlust" is just a haste stat that gets applied to 45sec out of the fight duration (it assumes you only benefit from bloodlust once per fight, which is almost always true).
